results.content: All in all a pretty decent course. Two things that would improve it would be to 1. add source code as a resource at the start and end of each section. 2. break the tutorials into smaller chunks to allow students to go back and find relevant points easily.

response.content: Thanks a lot for the honest response. Will note it for my further courses :)
